attributes.action: to scrap the ban against “tyler, the creator” and let him into the UK
attributes.additional_details: he has had an extremely positive effect on me and all of the people i know who listen to him.
attributes.background: the ban was created because of the homophobic and violent comments he made in the album GOBLIN. as he isn’t homophobic and he has even come out as bisexual now. “tyler, the creator” is not a mean person and if he was allowed it would make many many people delighted because he could perform concerts.
